QuestData.Title: The Wayward Crone
QuestData.Description:
<The ledger indicates that an old woman named Helena Gentle recently took up residence in a house down the road from the town.
The villagers' writings point to her being involved somehow with a variety of maladies that struck the village recently.
It's possible that she may know what's behind this spell, if it hasn't afflicted her as well.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Helena Gentle in her home outside of Fallhaven.
QuestData.RewardText:
Why hello there, young $gman:woman;.
We don't get many visitors to Fallhaven. What brings you to my home?
